FuncDef: The remove command deletes the specified file from the SFTP server. The remove command deletes the specified file from the SFTP server.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the file name.
It is a string data type. The absolute path of the file range is from 1 to 1060 characters. It contains the alphanumeric and special characters.

ExtraInfo: You can delete a maximum of 10 files at a time.
